phrases: I realize this is selfish of me,
but I will be around fifteen minutes late to the office.
I have to discipline my unreasonable son.
I realize this would sound highly trivial to anyone else.
Yes, as soon as I am done.
Yes, I will head right to the office.
If you will excuse me, sir.
Curse that Kosaku Kawajiri being so apologetic.
Did you want to climb the corporate ladder that badly,
The reason Josuke went into that house
is because he knew he would have the upper hand in a close-quarters battle.
I will admit that is true.
It is best that I avoid close-quarters combat with Shining Diamond.
If I can figure out just where Josuke is,
I can shoot an air bullet from here, but...
What do you think you are doing on this property?
Are you saying you are not on this property?
Do not get nitpicky with me, Mr. Goody Two-shoes.
How long have you been watching?
Hey, I am the one asking the questions here.
I was thinking about sleeping past noon
when I was woken up by some kind of noise.
Rio, from next door, said her underwear gets stolen all the time.
And since everyone is gone around this time...
Of all the free time you seem to have.
He was an underwear thief after all!
Episode 38 Shining D (Diamond) is Unbreakable, Part 2
I am going to beat the crap out of
Yoshikage Kira with my Shining Diamond and defeat him.
I am going to end this within a few minutes.
Hayato, stay along the wall there so that Kira cannot see you.
going to enter from... is the question.
There is one heading toward you right now!
It is about the same size as earlier...
There is no way he can tell where you are from outside!
We can tell where the ball of air is.
You will be able to dodge it!
No matter how many come through, you will be able to dodge them... now...
Yoshikage Kira knows where I am.
There were no windows in that room!
The curtains are all drawn, too!
There is no way he can see you from outside!
It must be automatically chasing you!
The version of Deadly Queen that is
automatic goes after heat and is called Heart Attack.
It is not going after the lit cigarette there.
More importantly, if it was automatically tracking me,
the air bullet would not be able to go through the wall,
and Yoshikage Kira plans to do the final detonation himself to finish me off.
It is a mystery, but he knows exactly where I am!
Find out how he is watching me!
H-He is right outside the gate.
I cannot figure out how he is able to pinpoint your location from there, Josuke.
I do not know how he is watching me...
But I did not want you chasing me in the first place!
All right, it is going to impact on Josuke!
But I was on my guard.
Your willpower to try to get one final blow in...
That is why I will not go near you, Josuke Higashikata.
It was a direct hit, but he was not blown away.
There is a slight discrepancy when I detonate by hand...
I can finish him off with the next shot!
We have to get away from here!
Y-You are pulling me the wrong way...
I am going to kill him!
We need to go in the direction of Yoshikage Kira...
But once my blood has left my body and hardened, it is just another object.
It is no longer part of me.
Therefore, I can gather it and stick it onto other things.
So I stuck some inside a shard of glass.
The rain stopped, and the blood stain on his jacket earlier...
That is my automatic tracking bomb.
The shard of glass that I was able to guard against...
It must be this blood stain...
This stain must have led that glass shard right to me!
It is embedded right into Kira's back!
Josuke Higashikata's Shining Diamond is a Stand whose actions I cannot foresee...
But the damage Josuke sustained is greater than mine.
One more shot and I, Yoshikage Kira, will be victorious!
Th-This one's big enough to see!
that this is his final shot.
I-I do not think the same attack will work twice on Kira!
We will just have to see about that...
but the lighter from earlier is in my pocket.
Could you get it for me?
It is a bit hard for me to get it myself with
this pole sticking out of my stomach.
You can see the air bullet!
The air bullet is not what I want to use the lighter to see this time.
I am going to look at something else...
Let us find out why he can see where I am.
Did he just happen to have it?
So then, who was he talking to?
Was it his boss from the office?
There is only one person that Kira would be calling right now...
I would completely forgotten about you, old man in the picture...
The one who is trying to protect Yoshikage Kira!
I have no idea when he got inside my pocket, but...
Th-The air bullet passed through the window!
Josuke... is running away three meters ahead.
And he is now moving diagonally right, then up...
He has not figured out that it is Josuke because he is using a raspy voice!
And now, he is running away one meter to the left...
How can you do that, you bastard?!
Josuke's been blown away, has not he?
Yeah, he was gloriously blown away.
All the way to Hell, with my directions.
Though, I mean, he was a ghost to begin with,
so it is more like he finally made it over.
Th-This must be some kind of mistake...
should not be happening in my life...
when I just want to live as peacefully as a plant...
But what I must not forget at times like these
is that it is in times like these,
I have learned that in the past.
When I am backed into a corner, if I think things through rationally,
I, Yoshikage Kira, have always done this.
There is no trouble that I was
This is a close-quarters match, and it will be over in an instant.
b-but if Kira touches him, he will be turned into a bomb!
A-And the wounds in Josuke's leg and torso from that blast...
Josuke, you should not even be able to stand right now.
I am going to be defeated...
I, Yoshikage Kira, am going to be defeated!
Is fate really on the side of that murderer?
M-My fists did not hit him...
These air bullets acted like cushions!
B-But it was not my intention to have it guard me...
I did not have time for that!
Stray Cat thought it was being attacked,
so it instinctively blocked the attack!
A opportunity has presented itself at the worst of times, after all!
Change that air bullet into a bomb!
I have changed it into a contact bomb!
It will explode if anyone touches it.
Josuke, with the damage you are currently suffering from,
you will not have the strength to dodge this!
It does not matter if it is glass or wood!
This always happens when life deals its worst to me!
Luck is on the side of Yoshikage Kira!
Th-The air bullet went off its course!
where all the stuff I scrape away with The Hand goes.
Though I am not really smart,
so whenever I think too much about anything, I get a headache.
I-I cannot believe it... I-It is Okuyasu.
But his heart and breathing had completely stopped...
While I was walking amid the darkness in that dream, I saw a light.
And I saw my dead brother...
He asked me where I was going,
so I said that I was going to follow him.
I mean, my Bro was always reliable.
He never made any bad decisions, so I would have nothing to worry about.
But then he said I should decide for myself.
He said, Okuyasu, you are the one who has to decide where you are going to go.
and answered that I was going back to Morioh, and then I woke up.
It was a really sad dream.
Y-You have got some nerve, dreaming at a time like this!
If you were alive, you should have woken up sooner, damn it!
Fate should have been on my side...
I should have been given my opportunity!
Now Kira will not be able to use his air bullet bombs!
There has never been any trouble that I, Yoshikage Kira, was unable to overcome!
That loud sound must have come from that house.
Josuke and Okuyasu are there, too!
That kid is Hayato Kawajiri from the picture.
And that man is Kosaku Kawajiri.
It looks like everything's falling into place.
Any fate that would side with you...
Any opportunity that would come your way...
is nothing compared to the heart of justice that is here right now!
It is right here for sure!
Compared to that heart, you are nothing!
